name: places/ChIJMTKH3wL2wokRDDOqMwbnXk4
formattedAddress: 1683 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1683 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10029-4635, USA

originalText.text: The place was great. It has different  size machines to accommodate all washing. The dryers have right temperature, so you don't have to put more time after more time like at some laundry places. Also the staff is so polite. This will be my permanent washing location.

text.text: The place was great. It has different  size machines to accommodate all washing. The dryers have right temperature, so you don't have to put more time after more time like at some laundry places. Also the staff is so polite. This will be my permanent washing location.

originalText.text: Hostile environment. Each time it gets worse. The latest I could take from this business is that I showed up to do laundry at 7:50pm. They told me to go because they were closed. They have this big sign right by the entrance. Keeping it open for just one customer is not good for the business. There is a reason their customers are abandoning them.

text.text: Hostile environment. Each time it gets worse. The latest I could take from this business is that I showed up to do laundry at 7:50pm. They told me to go because they were closed. They have this big sign right by the entrance. Keeping it open for just one customer is not good for the business. There is a reason their customers are abandoning them.

originalText.text: Great value! Fairly new machines in good order. $2 for a double load. Drying 25c/min. $1/lb for wash and fold. Last wash is 830. Spanish is useful but not essential.

text.text: Great value! Fairly new machines in good order. $2 for a double load. Drying 25c/min. $1/lb for wash and fold. Last wash is 830. Spanish is useful but not essential.

originalText.text: This business is a fraud and they are not loyal to their customers. I've spent $65 per month on wash & fold at this location for the past 3+ years and they refuse to exchange quarters for cash because I no longer use this particular service. If they're not making money off of you, they will not be of any service to you. No good for the community! You should service any other laundromat in the area but not this one.

If they're not making money off of you, they will not be of any service to you. No good for the community! You should service any other laundromat in the area but not this one.

originalText.text: I have given business to this Laundry faithfully for about 2 years now monthly!! since i moved into that neighborhood.. so i’m no stranger i may not speak at all only to receive change for my larger bills but besides that i have never really conversed. The Ending of October 2020 i had a horrible flooding in my apartment and i was just over worked stressed out and tired i worked a 9 hour shift the day of then the same night got home to spend the next 7 hours removing water by hand from my home then i had to  wash all our clothes that soaked up all the flood water in my hamper!! the next morning. I made a call before showing up around 10am and Spoke to a older hispanic Mami and i asked her if i can wash my clothes at home because i do have a washer but would i be able to come in and DRY my clothes there and she told me YES i can. So i washed everything packed it all up into my Cart and walked there with my young Daughter to DRY our clothes to only be told by the Heavy set guy that works there i can’t dry my clothes because i didn’t wash there !! even after i told him i Called and the lady told me i can. So after i called the morning of did all my washing i had to leave and search for another laundry then ask them to dry my clothes after walking and walking i found a place that was very far away from the area i live! I was so drained after working then dealing with this flooding in my home to then have to deal with this horrible guy! Fast forward now it’s MONDAY November 2nd 2020 i came back and gave my money to this place because honestly it’s barely any Laundry’s around and the other one thats around there is sitting right on a Hill and it’s just to much for me pushing a heavy cart up and down that hill. My daughter and i Came around 5:30 and left just before 7:20 but right before i left i watched as this Middle aged hispanic woman speaking to the same Heavy set Guy that told me you cannot dry here if you didn’t wash here! i then watched as she pushed her cart filled with 3 full laundry bags and some smaller shopping bags filled with wet clothes she walked straight to the driers right pass me and my daughter and started throwing her clothes in!! So i then proceeded to walk out the store because i’m finished doing my laundry but right before i left, the store had a handful of folks standing around and they all witnessed me ask this Guy hey i thought you turned me away and told me that you can’t dry here if you didn’t wash here but i literally just watched as you allow this woman to do so... So now I fully know what this was he is being Bias towards me and my daughter, this Guy then had some nerve to sit up and sit back in his chair Look at me and Smirk! then said maybe if you had asked me Nicely i would of allowed it mind you all i was never disrespectful i never spoken to him crazy nothing i said to him i Called and spoke to a woman she told me i can i followed up with him then he looked at me and my daughter and immediately said NO ! so i know for a Fact it’s a Sexualizing and Bias Thing i’m so disgusted by this man and for my 6 year old Daughter to witness everything makes it even more DISGUSTING!
